text:
@realDonaldTrump @Varneyco Over 4 million infected

150k dead

GDP drops 33%

Herman Cain dead from coronavirus 

Three former presidents at the funeral for John Lewis

My guess is, you weren't even welcome to attend 

And your focus is on fucking pizza

In a nutshell. Why you'll lose. BIGLY.
